"The Awakening" is the popular name for a  statue created by J. Seward Johnson, Jr. It is a giant aluminum statue, 17 feet tall.[1]

The statue is located at National Harbor in Prince George's County, Maryland, just outside the District of Columbia.[2]

The statue depicts a giant embedded in the earth and struggling to free himself.[3] 

The name of the statue is "The Awakening." [1, 3]
